DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to prove the improvement of pubo-femoral distance by early abduction splintage in one-month-old infants with developmental dysplasia of the hip (with a clinical stable hip but an abnormal hip ultrasonography).
DOC.brief_title: Early Abduction Splintage on Stable Hips in Infants With Developmental Dysplasia of the Hip
DOC.criteria: Term infants Infants between 1 and 2 months of age at inclusion Clinically stable hip Pathological ultrasonography : pubofemoral distance >6mm and bony rim percentage <50% Non objection of the family Clinically unstable hip Normal ultrasonography Neuroorthopedic disease Postural deformity of the pelvis Participation refusal
